Can you create a multiple choice question using the [LaTeX] data format to test knowledge of basic linear algebra concepts?
Given the matrix $A = \begin{bmatrix} 1 & 2 \\ -3 & 4 \end{bmatrix}$, what is the determinant of $A$?
(A) $-10$
(B) $10$
(C) $-11$
(D) $11$
Use the following MATLAB code to verify your answer:
A = [1 2; -3 4];
detA = det(A);
